tutorial.speak:
This tutorial will show you how to make automated tasks in B1.church Admin. This feature is great if you want to set up a task that will repeat itself over time. For instance sending birthday cards to a certain group of people. Let’s begin at the B1.church Admin dashboard.
Click on “Dashboard” and navigate down to Serving.
In the serving portal click on Tasks.
Click on automations
Click add automations to create a new automated task
Give the task a title
Choose how often you want the task to repeat, be sure to click save.
Choose who to assign the task to. You can assign it to a specific person or a group.
Next, set the conditions for the task by selecting the Condition type, Operator, and Value. After you add the Condition type, and Operator click save. Add as many conditions as you like.
Click on the Automated Task to view the Automation Details
To manage your automated tasks just click on the edit pencil next to the Automation Details, Actions or Conditions sections.
